body.p:
Wm H, Huff Formerlie Capt of Co E 7 Regt E. Tenn vol in States that J, M, Smith was in a private and his Co and was in the Fight at huntsville Tenn on the 15 Day of Aug 1862 and to his knowledg was there some Four weeks before the fite and to his knowledg was not in Rusell Co Ky on or about the 10 of aug/62 Further States that said Smith was a Boy of Good Carecter as far as was known the said J M Smith that I speak of is in Sentence to the penitenty fomley sent from
Rusell Co Ky he was aboy of good union principle and Faut for his country
these Facts I state to Be true
